idea:
Our startup desires to Create a strategy that will be trend setting and adapt to the industry changing requirements for fitness and wellness.

We desire to provide Customized fitness solutions that are cost effective and suitable to an individual requirement. Provide both online and offline fitness options suitable to all, thereby encouraging people to adapt fitness in their daily lives from anywhere. We also look forward to Create a profitable fitness business that will provide employment opportunities.
name: ASHUB FITNESS INDIA LLP

idea: We are Contractor of Building Construction,  we have 6 years experience with L&T, Shapoorji Pallonji Group, Birla Estates Etc.
name: Vrindavan Constructions

idea: We are here working on solving inefficiencies in the Agricultural sector by being the link between farmers and retails chains at large , giving markets to their produce , marketing the produce and opening up exporting avenues for the Indian Framers . In this process also increasing the income of Farmers and building a resilient and profitable business that takes the Indian produce to the world and the Indian citizens at large at affordable prices and high standards .
name: MEDHINI

idea:
Ideation Note:

Pandemic has taught us to interact with people, business and govt in more than physical interaction and thus we started seeing customers started having remote service delivery in its day to day demands such as online shopping, interaction over web meeting rooms, social media audio and video interactions.

C3 has also decided to take firm step to serve the customers in better way as well as build business opportunities for its business as well as for partners where in customers of any segment i.e., Enterprise, SME and Home can visit website of web app as well as download the mobile app to get instant online support and services for all its technology needs.
name: Dial IT Tech Services

idea: Aarambh Realcon Private Limited is a design-build general contractor for low-rise steel-framed buildings.  We are so good at constructing the concrete foundations as well as designing, furnishing and erecting the steel buildings that we often perform one or more of these services for other contractors, EPCs and owners. We really excel when project designs get complicated.
name: AARAMBH REALCON PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Its history, knowledge, and resources are derived from the Management's successful projects of a similar sort, which has provided the company with its foundation, skills, and resources. To achieve this goal, the company develops and delivers bespoke projects and service solutions to its international clients and partners.
name: STREVEN TECHPRO PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
They say happiness is a journey, not a destination. But why bother with the struggle? Wouldn't it be better if you could just get to the good part right now? Well, now you can. Emotions are the great equalizer. They make us feel alive and vibrant. And now, we've identified the most influential factors at work in our brains that get us to that good place as quickly as possible. We've distilled those factors into an app that literally fits in your pocket and enables anyone at any time to override their natural emotions and become instantly happy on demand.

We give you the power to change your mood! Our application uses tones, music, and videos to create an experience that can change one's emotions and mindset. The application is designed to specifically be used during times that one feels mentally or physically incapable of accomplishing a task.
name: Betternotebook

idea:
Acertec Infotech is software division of Acertec Technologies Pvt Ltd. We started our journey since 2014 as an IT infrastructure and software company.

We design wide range of advanced customized software applications, ERP and Web applications.

Our aim is to provide quality, reliable and the best service to our clients. We aim at reaching the heart of every single client and for this our primary focus has always been on our quality and service.
name: ACERTEC TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
